mapper.insert: insert ignore into seckill.success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) values (#{secKillId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select:
select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" from seckill.success_killed sk
inner join seckill.seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{secKillId} and sk.user_phone = #{userPhone}
